sources.title: The Ape Man 1943 | Horror, Sci-Fi | Bela Lugosi, Louise Currie, Wallace Ford | Movie, Subtitles
sources.description:
A crazed scientist accidentally turns himself into a half ape, half human creature, and scrambles to find a cure. 

Colorized version https://youtu.be/HWRPcFeDEVc

Original title: The Ape Man (1943)

Director: William Beaudine
Writers: Karl Brown, Barney A. Sarecky
Stars: Bela Lugosi, Louise Currie, Wallace Ford
Genres: Drama, Horror, Sci-Fi

This film has English & Italian audio options. Go to video settings ⚙️ to modify your audio/subtitle options.
